diff_act: 1.display the group identity of the voice call on the MMI
2.automatically connect group or broadcast calls to the handset when off the hook

regen.absent_element: automatic connection of group or broadcast calls to the loudspeaker when the handset is off the hook and to the handset when it is off the hook is mentioned but not the condition when the handset is on the hook
regen.new_specification: The system shall automatically connect group or broadcast calls to the loudspeaker if the handset is on the hook.

regen.absent_element: handling of incoming group or broadcast voice call when the handset is in use but on the hook
regen.new_specification: The system shall automatically connect group or broadcast calls to the loudspeaker if the handset is on the hook and in use.

regen.absent_element: disconnecting or ending an ongoing group or broadcast call
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide a mechanism for the driver to disconnect or end an ongoing group or broadcast call

label: be connected to the handset if the handset is off hook.
absence: situation of the handset is off hook
